00015 typedef unsigned Identifier;
00016 
00017 template<typename T>
00018 class array{
00019   friend class GadgetSnapshot;
00020  protected:
00021   T *m_Data;
00022   Identifier m_Size;
00023   Identifier m_Backinsert;
00024  public:
00025   array( void ) : m_Data(NULL), m_Size(0), m_Backinsert(0) {}; 
00026   array( Identifier aSize ){
00027     m_Data = new T[aSize];
00028     m_Size = aSize;
00029     m_Backinsert = 0;
00030   }
00031   array( array<T> &aArray ){
00032     m_Size = aArray.m_Size;
00033     m_Data = new T[m_Size];
00034     m_Backinsert = aArray.m_Size;
00035     for( Identifier i=0; i<m_Size; ++i )
00036       m_Data[i] = aArray[i];
00037   }
00038   ~array(){
00039     if(m_Data != NULL)
00040       delete[] m_Data;
00041   }
00042   // just encapsulate a given array
00043   array( T* dataptr, Identifier size ){
00044     m_Data = dataptr;
00045     m_Size = size;
00046   }
00047   inline void reserve( Identifier aSize ){
00048     if( m_Data != NULL )
00049       delete[] m_Data;
00050     m_Size = aSize;
00051     m_Data = new T[aSize];
00052   }
00053   inline void resize( Identifier aSize ){
00054     T *DataTemp = new T[aSize];
00055     for( Identifier i=0; i<m_Size && i<aSize; ++i )
00056       DataTemp[i] = m_Data[i];
00057     delete[] m_Data;
00058     m_Data = DataTemp;
00059     m_Size = aSize;
00060   }
00061         
00062   inline void push_back( T Elem ){
00063     m_Data[m_Backinsert++] = Elem;
00064   }
00065   inline T &operator[]( Identifier i ) const{
00066     return m_Data[i];
00067   }
00068   inline Identifier size( void ) const{
00069     return m_Size;
00070   }
00071   inline bool find( T elem ) const{
00072     bool bRetVal = false;
00073     for( Identifier i=0; i<m_Size; ++i ){
00074       if( elem == m_Data[i] ){
00075     bRetVal = true;
00076     break;
00077       }
00078     }
00079     return bRetVal;
00080   }
00081   inline void clear( void ) {
00082     m_Size = 0;
00083     delete[] m_Data;
00084     m_Data = NULL;
00085   }
00086   inline T* data_ptr( void ){
00087     return &m_Data[0];
00088   }
00089 };

00093 #include <iterator>
00094 template <class T>
00095 class list
00096 {
00097   struct Node
00098   {
00099     Node(const T& x,Node* y = 0):m_data(x),m_next(y){}
00100     T m_data;
00101     Node* m_next;
00102   };
00103 
00104   Node* m_node;
00105   Identifier m_n;
00106 
00107  public:
00108   // need forward declaration to avoid warnings
00109   class const_iterator;
00110 
00111   class iterator
00112     : public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, T>
00113     {
00114       Node* m_rep;
00115     public:
00116       friend class list;
00117       friend class const_iterator;
00118       typedef T value_type;
00119       typedef T& reference;
00120       typedef T* pointer;
00121       typedef int difference_type;
00122       typedef std::forward_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00123 
00124       inline iterator(Node* x=0):m_rep(x){}
00125       inline iterator(const iterator& x):m_rep(x.m_rep) {}
00126       inline iterator& operator=(const iterator& x)
00127     { 
00128       m_rep=x.m_rep; return *this; 
00129     }
00130       inline iterator& operator++()
00131     { 
00132       m_rep = m_rep->m_next; return *this; 
00133     }
00134       inline iterator operator++(int)
00135     { 
00136       iterator tmp(*this); m_rep = m_rep->m_next; return tmp; 
00137     }
00138       inline reference operator*() const { return m_rep->m_next->m_data; }
00139       inline pointer operator->() const { return m_rep->m_next; }
00140       inline bool operator==(const iterator& x) const
00141     {
00142       return m_rep == x.m_rep; 
00143     }   
00144       inline bool operator!=(const iterator& x) const
00145     {
00146       return m_rep != x.m_rep; 
00147     }   
00148 
00149     };
00150 
00151   class const_iterator
00152     : public std::iterator<std::forward_iterator_tag, const T>
00153     {
00154       const Node* m_rep;
00155     public:
00156       friend class list;
00157       friend class iterator;
00158       typedef T value_type;
00159       typedef T& reference;
00160       typedef T* pointer;
00161       inline const_iterator(const Node* x=0):m_rep(x){}
00162       inline const_iterator(const const_iterator& x):m_rep(x.m_rep) {}
00163       inline const_iterator(const iterator& x):m_rep(x.m_rep){}
00164       inline const_iterator& operator=(const const_iterator& x)
00165     { 
00166       m_rep=x.m_rep; return *this; 
00167     }
00168       inline const_iterator& operator=(const iterator& x)
00169     { 
00170       m_rep=x.m_rep; return *this; 
00171     }       
00172       inline const_iterator& operator++()
00173     { 
00174       m_rep = m_rep->m_next; return *this; 
00175     }
00176       inline const_iterator operator++(int)
00177     { 
00178       const_iterator tmp(*this); m_rep = m_rep->m_next; return tmp; 
00179     }
00180       inline reference operator*() const { return m_rep->m_next->m_data; }
00181       inline pointer operator->() const { return m_rep->m_next; }
00182       inline bool operator==(const const_iterator& x) const
00183     {
00184       return m_rep == x.m_rep; 
00185     }
00186       inline bool operator!=(const const_iterator& x) const
00187     {
00188       return m_rep != x.m_rep; 
00189     }

00195 
00196   list() : m_node(new Node(T())) { m_node->m_next = m_node; m_n=0;}
00197 
00198   list(const list& L) : m_node(new Node(T()))
00199     {
00200       m_n = 0;
00201       m_node->m_next=m_node;
00202       for ( const_iterator i = L.begin(); i!= L.end(); ++i )
00203     push_front(*i);
00204       reverse();
00205     }
00206 
00207   void reverse()
00208     {
00209       if (empty())
00210     return;
00211       Node* new_m_node = m_node->m_next->m_next;
00212       Node* p = m_node; Node* i = m_node->m_next; Node* n;
00213       do  
00214     {
00215       n = i->m_next;
00216       i->m_next = p;
00217       p = i; i = n;
00218     }
00219       while (p!=m_node);
00220       m_node = new_m_node;
00221     }
00222 
00223   void swap(list& x)
00224     {
00225       Node* tmp = m_node; m_node = x.m_node; x.m_node = tmp;
00226       Identifier ntmp = m_n; m_n = x.m_n; x.m_n = ntmp;
00227     }
00228 
00229   list& operator=(const list& x)
00230     {
00231       list tmp(x);
00232       swap(tmp);
00233       return *this;
00234     }
00235 
00236   ~list() { clear(); delete m_node; }
00237   //    void clear() { while (!empty()) pop_front(); }
00238   inline void clear() {
00239     Node* cur = (Node*) m_node->m_next;
00240     while( cur != m_node ){
00241       Node *tmp = cur;
00242       cur = (Node*) cur->m_next;
00243       //destroy( &tmp->m_data );
00244       //put_node( tmp );
00245       delete tmp;
00246     }
00247     m_node->m_next = m_node;
00248     m_n = 0;
00249   }

00254   inline void push_front(const T&x)
00255     {
00256       insert (begin(),x);
00257     }
00258   inline void push_back(const T& x)
00259     {
00260       insert (end(),x);
00261     }
00262   inline void pop_front()
00263     {
00264       erase(begin());
00265     }
00266   //inline bool empty() { return m_node == m_node->m_next; }
00267   inline bool empty() { return m_n == 0; }
00268 
00269   inline T& front() { return *begin(); }
00270   inline const T& front() const { return *begin(); }
00271   inline T& back() { return m_node->data; }
00272   inline const T& back() const { return m_node->data; }
00273 
00274   inline iterator begin() { return iterator(m_node->m_next); }
00275   //inline iterator begin() { return (Node*)(m_node->m_next); }
00276   inline iterator end() { return iterator(m_node); }
00277   //inline iterator end() { return (Node*)m_node; }
00278   inline const_iterator begin() const 
00279     { 
00280       return const_iterator(m_node->m_next); 
00281     }
00282   inline const_iterator end() const 
00283     { 
00284       return const_iterator(m_node); 
00285     }
00286 
00287   iterator erase (iterator x)
00288     {
00289       if (x==end())
00290     return x;
00291       if (x.m_rep->m_next == m_node)
00292     m_node = x.m_rep;
00293 
00294       Node* tmp = x.m_rep->m_next;
00295       x.m_rep->m_next = x.m_rep->m_next->m_next;
00296       delete tmp;
00297       --m_n;
00298       return x;
00299     }
00300 
00301   iterator insert (iterator x, const T& y)
00302     {
00303       Node* tmp = new Node(y,x.m_rep->m_next);
00304       if (x.m_rep == m_node)
00305     m_node = tmp;
00306       x.m_rep->m_next = tmp;
00307       ++m_n;
00308       return x;
00309     }
00310 
00311   // rotate x to beginning
00312   void rotate (iterator x)
00313     {
00314       if (x == end())
00315     return;
00316       Node* sentinel = m_node->m_next;
00317       m_node->m_next = m_node->m_next->m_next;
00318       sentinel->m_next = x.m_rep->m_next;
00319       x.m_rep->m_next = sentinel;
00320       m_node = x.m_rep; 
00321     }

00327     other.erase(x);
00328     }
00329

00332         
00333         
00334     //      other.clear();

00336     
00337   inline void splice( list<T>& other )
00338     {       
00339       Node *head1, *head2;
00340       head1 = m_node->m_next;
00341       head2 = other.m_node->m_next;
00342         
00343       m_node->m_next = other.m_node->m_next->m_next;
00344       other.m_node->m_next = head1;
00345       m_node = other.m_node;
00346         
00347       other.m_node = head2;
00348       head2->m_next = head2;
00349         
00350       m_n += other.m_n;
00351       other.m_n = 0;
00352     }
00353     
00354   inline Identifier size( void )
00355     {
00356       return m_n;
00357     }
00358             
00359 };
00360 
00361 template<class T>
00362 void 
00363 convertlists( std::list<T> &listto, list<T> &listfrom )
00364 {
00365   typename list<T>::iterator it = listfrom.begin();
00366   while( it!=listfrom.end() ){
00367     listto.push_back(*it);
00368     ++it;
00369   }
00370 }
